评论详情: Quality material and True to size.

评论概述: Wouldn't even use it for a wood fire

评论详情: Not slouchy as shown in the pic.
This is a nice top. The quality of the fabric is good. The neckline looks like a cut off and hangs off one shoulder. The bottom of the tee has a large hem and tapers in a bit.

There's no collar or trim, it's pretty thin but nice for lounging around, PJs. looks super cute on my wife, she's wearing a medium, which fits her well, if you want it to be loose, or off shoulder - order a size up. the graphic isn't too heavy, I was hoping for a thicker graphic but
This shirt is a winner! It's adorable, comfortable, and soft against my skin. While it's a bit thin, it's still flattering and true to size. I love wearing it!

This is a good shirt, but the material isn’t stretchy, which is important for an off shoulder shirt. The fabric is also kind of hot, so it’s not a good idea to wear it while you’re exercising. Overall a good product.
4.0 cute soft held up in wash runs a bit small so get a few sizes bigger would recommened for price
